Internet Remarks: Parc East is located within the beautifully unspoiled community of Port Coquitlam that skirts the Eastern ridge of the Tri-Cities. Hemmed by multi-use trails, open park spaces, quaint shops & other amenities, this is a well cared for 1 bedroom 602 sq ft home. Just minutes to Coquitlam Centre and the recently unveiled Evergreen SkyTrain, this bustling little neighbourhood is the perfect spot to find a place of your own. From Sunday mornings huddled away in cozy cafes, to friendly neighbourhood markets, restaurants, & fitness/yoga studios, residents here want for nothing. Bordered by no less than 90km of hiking trails alongside silver-capped mountains and the glimmering banks of the Coquitlam River, one has the feeling this is the way a perfect home ought to be. Showings by appointment only.
